question: ‘Gabba’, which was seen in the news recently, is the place located in which country?
explanation:
The Brisbane Cricket Ground, is a major sports stadium in Queensland, Australia. The name of the stadium is received from the location of ‘Woolloongabba’ town.
Recently, the Indian Cricket team won and retained the Border-Gavaskar Trophy by winning the test series. The Australian team have not lost for the last 32 years in the Brisbane Ground. This is also the second test series in Australia, after the first series win in 2018-19.
